Furious Assault.name: Furious Assault
Furious Assault.sourceRef: Player's Handbook 2, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms
Furious Assault.flavor: Your monstrous wrath burns inside you, giving strength to your attack.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack.

Effect: The attack deals 1[W] extra damage if it’s a weapon attack or 1d8 extra damage if it is not a weapon attack.
Furious Assault.trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack.
Furious Assault.effect: The attack deals 1[W] extra damage if it’s a weapon attack or 1d8 extra damage if it is not a weapon attack.

Untamed Aggression.name: Untamed Aggression
Untamed Aggression.flavor: You foil an enemy’s attempt to slip away with an aggressive step forward.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: An enemy adjacent to you shifts.

Effect: You can shift 1 square, and you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.
Untamed Aggression.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you shifts.
Untamed Aggression.effect: You can shift 1 square, and you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.

Revitalizing Charge.name: Revitalizing Charge
Revitalizing Charge.flavor: You exhilarate in the rush to engage your foe, growing more confident with each enemy that fails to stop you.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You charge an enemy.

Effect: You gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your Strength modifier. In addition, you gain a power bonus to your charge attack roll equal to the number of enemies that attack you during your charge movement.
Revitalizing Charge.effect: You gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your Strength modifier. In addition, you gain a power bonus to your charge attack roll equal to the number of enemies that attack you during your charge movement.

Blood-Fueled Fervor.name: Blood-Fueled Fervor
Blood-Fueled Fervor.flavor: Your attack strikes true, and you feel your blood surge even as your enemy feels its life fade.
Blood-Fueled Fervor.trigger: You hit a bloodied enemy with an attack.
Blood-Fueled Fervor.effect: You can spend a healing surge. In addition, you can make a saving throw with a +2 power bonus.

Killer’s Mind.name: Killer’s Mind
Killer’s Mind.flavor: You harden your thoughts and think of nothing other than dealing death to your foes.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and to Will. When an attack targets your Will, you can make a basic attack against the attacker as an immediate reaction.
Killer’s Mind.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and to Will. When an attack targets your Will, you can make a basic attack against the attacker as an immediate reaction.

Athletic Grace.name: Athletic Grace
Athletic Grace.flavor: Your conditioning allows you to maintain your footing.
keywords:
Personal

Requirement: You must be trained in Athletics.

Effect: During any movement you make until the end of your turn, you ignore difficult terrain. In addition, in place of any Acrobatics checks the movement requires, you can make Athletics checks with a +2 power bonus.
Athletic Grace.requirement: You must be trained in Athletics.
Athletic Grace.effect: During any movement you make until the end of your turn, you ignore difficult terrain. In addition, in place of any Acrobatics checks the movement requires, you can make Athletics checks with a +2 power bonus.

Fierce Vigilance.name: Fierce Vigilance
Fierce Vigilance.flavor: Where others tire and let their focus waver, your stamina keeps you alert.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You roll initiative.

Effect: Add your Endurance bonus to the roll instead of your initiative modifier.
Fierce Vigilance.effect: Add your Endurance bonus to the roll instead of your initiative modifier.

Jolting Shout.name: Jolting Shout
Jolting Shout.flavor: When a friend is having trouble shaking off adverse effects, nothing is more motivating than your angry shout.
keywords:
Close burst 5

Target: One or two allies who can hear you in the burst

Effect: Each target makes a saving throw against one effect on him or her that a save can end.
Jolting Shout.target: One or two allies who can hear you in the burst
Jolting Shout.effect: Each target makes a saving throw against one effect on him or her that a save can end.
